updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Verify BLOCK notification with new variables: Source IP, Destination IP, OU, groups, POP, From User, Date and Time
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create custom block template with existing variables with new name: Source IP, Destination IP, OU, groups, POP, From User, Date and Time

Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy for upload for Box application.

Perform Upload to Box application.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure Source IP, Destination IP, OU, groups, POP, From User, Date and Time are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.

updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Validate all the variables are displayed properly on client notification when template is created with all the available variables for message field on Windows
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name, User, 
Instance ID, Object Name, Source IP (Real Time Policy), Destination IP (Real Time Policy), Groups, OU, POP, From User, From User, Time, Malware Name, Application Session ID, Transaction ID, HTTP Referer, URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme, URL.

Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy for upload for Box application.

Perform Upload to Box application.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name, User, 
Instance ID, Object Name, Source IP (Real Time Policy), Destination IP (Real Time Policy), Groups, OU, POP, From User, From User, Time, Malware Name, Application Session ID, Transaction ID, HTTP Referer, URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme and URL are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.
